caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: Here's a mistake: when I share a link from the site on a mobile device, then visit from a desktop, the link leads to nowhere useful. Just like this link did.
hmmm that's weird! any link on any website? or just in a specific website you have? coz i know some bugs in the Facebook share and link plugins
No, I mean the link you posted. It seems shared from a mobile device, the URL I go to has "mobile" in it. But I can see the article. Instead it's an ad about the magazine.
there are download links in the bottom. I think the problem is that the app is only available for U.S Users :S
So, I have to download an app to read the article?
